text: Vair-sur-Loire is a commune. It is in the Pays de la Loire region in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Saint-Herblon (the seat) and Anetz.Arrêté préfectoral 29 October 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Vair-sur-Loire
